author: Kyle Bakx
title: Shop owners frantically launch online stores to stay open during pandemic
description: Many shops across the country are hurrying to launch online sales or expand their offerings to keep their businesses operating and meet customer demand. Still, the process can be challenging and time-consuming.
content:
For a few years, Theresa Ransom has wanted to venture into online sales for her Calgary gift boutique, but could never find the time.
Now, with the pandemic shutting down most retail stores across the country, including her own, she's invested many late nigh… [+4677 chars]
